description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ce819","text":"The Fontana-Masson Staining Protocol is a detailed method for staining free-floating sections (20-50 microns) to detect melanin and other pigments in tissue samples. The procedure involves preparing a silver nitrate working solution, treating sections with triton, and sequential incubation in pre-heated silver nitrate solution, gold chloride, and thiosulfate solutions, with thorough washing steps between each incubation. The process concludes with sections being placed in PBS for mounting and counterstaining. This protocol is critical for histological studies in biology, particularly for pigment analysis in tissues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ck4k","text":"Silver Nitrate working solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k3r6","text":"- Prepare a 1:3 solution of silver nitrate solution in distilled water. Prepare enough solution for the amount of sections you want to stain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3j1q4","text":"- Add drop by drop concentrated ammonium hydroxide, while shaking, until the solution gradually turns transparent. Be careful and stop the addition of ammoniacal solution as soon as you get {"blocks":[{"key":"8rgno","text":"Place the sections to stain (up to 7-8 sections) in a   Eppendorf tube. Incubate the sections in 0.3% triton for two hours at room temperature while shaking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4i3oc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bea8l","text":"Wash 3 times with distilled water for 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjvis","text":"Pre-heat the silver nitrate working solution for 5 minutes at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a7tq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arpno","text":"Incubate the sections in the preheated solution for 20 minutes at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ri7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"13t6r","text":"Wash the sections 3 times with abundant distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6aion","text":"From now on, perform the following steps in individual sections:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3b8u8","text":"Incubate the section with gold chloride solution. Apply enough solution to cover the section (approximately  ). Manually shake the tube for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7omm9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100-150","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bhqv5","text":"Wash the section 3 times with abundant distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6u7tq","text":"Incubate the section with thiosulfate solution. Apply enough solution to cover the section (approximately  ). Manually shake the tube for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c5nt6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100-150","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b8g0o","text":"Wash 3 times with distilled water for 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csk71","text":"Place the sections in PBS for mounting, counterstaining, etc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b5ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8c9ra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
